entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][debugger] Tests: Spawn MonoProxy in a separate process to avoid excessive memory usage for tests #95488
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient always fails on first attempted connection #95487
  • [wasm] Add WasmSingleFileBundle for browser-wasm projects too #95480
    9.0.0
  • Add ILStrip+wasm_opt pass when using WasmSingleFileBundle #95478
    9.0.0
  • Add a way to resolve IDictionary<,> from keyed service #95476
  • System.Runtime.Loader.*.Tests Fail Saying There is no .NET Found when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #95474
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization, SoftHypen is not ignored when it should be #95473
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization Invariant function differs from non-Hybrid #95471
    9.0.0
  • Register a custom crash handler #95461
    9.0.0
  • The character filter in HTTP StatusDescription is incorrect or there is a problem with the language pack. #95454
  • [browser][doc] how to start dotnet on WebWorker + demo #95452
    9.0.0
  • StrConv("text",VbStrConv.ProperCase) causes a confusing error error #95451
  • System.IO.Compression.SubReadStream Read Makes Unnecessary Calls #95450
  • build runtime faild Failed to build "CoreCLR component". #95449
  • [API Proposal]: Add multipart/related to `MediaTypeNames.Multipart` #95446
    Future
  • `TotalAvailableMemoryBytes` should not be negative in a Wasm process #95440
    9.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore.Save(Stream stream) can not suppport .NET8 #95448
  • Run single test using docker image #95436
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlcollect/dlcollect.sh #95434
  • [wasm] EmccCompile, and MonoAOTCompiler should explicitly use `IBuildEngine9.ReleaseCores` #95431
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] `EmitBundle*` task should handle incremental builds #95430
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Windows: Failure to build browser, mono+libs with clean build of the runtime #94106
    9.0.0
  • AOT Native DLL with exported function name of "free" fails when using HttpClient #95421
    9.0.0
  • Build crashes in System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationGuard #92007
    8.0.x
  • How to pass a string to a profiler with DisableRuntimeMarshallingAttribute present #95442
  • Missing .NET Framework 4.8.1 source code #95475
  • Document Networking metrics #90663
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: System.TypeLoadException : The type 'AudioToolbox.MidiRawData' cannot be found in assembly ... #95444
  • Enforcement too strict on Brotli Compression Level Enum #95455
  • [API Proposal]: Allow method built with an AsyncMethodBuilder to return something else than T #95472
  • Exception when doing snapshot in OnPaintSurface #94229
    9.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo.StandardName empty when run under ubuntu-latest NET 8, while value present with NET 6 #95213
    8.0.x
  • DateTime.Parse exception missing input value in .NET 8 #95331
    8.0.x
  • DateTimeOffset parsing methods do not support ISO8061 "basic format" #95458
  • Read JObject Property: System.Security.VerificationException: Operation could destabilize the runtime #95445
  • IJsonTypeInfoResolver change in behavior? #95438
  • [HTTP3] [outerloop] Requesting HTTP version 3.0 with version policy RequestVersionExact while unable to establish HTTP/3 connection #95413
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource` fails #91552
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `CancellationTokenRegistration_DisposeAsyncWhileCallbackRunning_WaitsForCallbackToComplete` fails #91577
    9.0.0
  • JSON parsing way to difficult #95453
  • JIT: Widespread jitstress failures with "Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()'" #95388
    9.0.0
  • FileStream(path, FileMode.Open) trying to create file #95447
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 #89425
    9.0.0
  • STJ source generator fails due to 260 character path length limit on Windows (with EmitCompilerGeneratedFiles=true) #93111
    Future
  • int.TryParse has ambiguous #94422
  • Process crash on simultaneous call of EventListener.DisposeOnShutdown() and EventListener.EnableEvents() #84091
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Wasm runtime features #95486
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Force inline small BasicBlock methods #95484
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] WS & HTTP clients more async #95483
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Add X0 field init at capture context. #95470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono][WIP] Try not fall back to interpreter for runtime invoke #95469
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] add LoongArch64's SIMD128/256 instructions within emitter. #95456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono][jit] Fix the bblock check in the box+callvirt optimization. #95443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Added ARM64 SVE_GA_2A encoding #95435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to the 'locker' GitHub action for locking closed/stale issues/PRs #95432
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasi] Simplify, and clean up target for bundled resource generation #95426
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Enable jump-to-next removal optimization in MinOpts #95340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix emission of runtime invoke wrappers. #95468
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [workloads] Fix the condition for the workload metrics #95424
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #95350
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95410
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure metadata for the type hierarchy is preserved #95457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Correct time zone name creation when generated lazily. #95364
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [libs] Remove test data duplicates #95462
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement
  • Fix FormatException message argument #95356
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • Switch PortableAppActivation tests to pre-built test asset #95441
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (3/N) #95306
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Throw OperationCanceledException with correct CancellationToken during QuicConnection cancellation #95459
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95325
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Clean up GT_NOP #95353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused FindResourceDuplicates.ps1 script #95412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove _monoAotBuildshCommand and _monoAotCrossCompileArg from pipelines #95416
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0] Free the tls memory on thread termination #95439
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Free the tls memory on thread termination #95362
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix MacOS arm64 assert in createdump #95433
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [8.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 8.0 branch #95423
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [7.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 7.0 branch #95422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.x

Updated

  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve branch optimizer around implied relops #95234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: alt jit range #95283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make GetKeyedServices(KeyedService.AnyKey) return all services #95308
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs-author-action, os-wasi
  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Implement straightforward ServicePoint(Manager) properties in HttpWebRequest #94664
    area-System.Net
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [Async-2] A few small tweaks on the managed side of state-machine based implementation. #2431
    area-async

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement WasmImportlinkage #2444

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New `--os` argument for `dotnet restore` #37245
    8.0.2xx
  • Published ConsoleApp with AOT throws error /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.29' not found #37240
  • add output format support for dotnet tool list command #37239
  • In Progress: Ideas for `dotnet tool update --all` #37237

Closed

  • [workloads] dotnet verify fails on 7.0.401 on some Windows machines #36270
  • `dotnet watch` broken in `8.0.100` #36918
  • dotnet watch test cannot configure output in .NET 8.0 #37244
  • Unexpected compile error #31691

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #37252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for test, build and other commands. #37233
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Use .NET 9.0 versions for task dependencies #37013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix install state file for MSI based installs #37223
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36804
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect app host used in build when PublishSingleFile=true #37114
    area-Single-File, untriaged
  • Move `src/Tests` to `test` #37200
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2326552 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37072
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create dummy AfterSdkPublish target Fixes #26710 #36850
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Disable Source Link in desktop WPF temp projects #37164
    Servicing-consider, Area-SourceLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal] Support extra generic type params in custom AsyncMethodBuilders #3723

Updated

  • [Proposal]: BinaryCompatOnlyAttribute #7706
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • Champion "User-defined Positional Patterns" #1047
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: clarify multi-dimensional arrays are not valid target types #7734

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense cannot determine type when inside a Tuple of Predicates #71041
  • Stack overflow in Rosyln CodeAnalysis when ambiguous name is used #71039
  • IDE Refactoring for IDE0032 (Use auto property) produces unhelpful/invalid fix #71032
  • [API Proposal]: Add `GetDeclaredSymbol` overload for `LocalFunctionStatementSyntax` #71028

Closed

  • Enable using collection expressions for IEnumerable<T> on .NET Framework 3.5 #71033
  • Transition F# and TS to IFindDefinitionService #50391
    Backlog
  • [API proposal] Collection expressions: IOperation support #70631
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix use-auto-prop with init-properties #71040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Properly escape ref path names that contain equals #71038
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update TFM for BuildHost in source build #71035
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move `EA.RazorCompiler` to `Experimental` #71029
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exception in PackageSettingsPersister #71027
  • Do not offer 'use collection expression' inside expression trees. #71026
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure we publish symbols for the BuildHost #71025
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove nullable suppression in GetSemanticModel #71037
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make GetDeclaredSymbol more strongly typed for LocalFunctionDeclarationSyntax #71034
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Unify code and services for go-to-def, peek and ctrl-click across C#/VB/TS/F# #71018
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Reset loop head state when local function starting state changes #71009
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix GetDocumentationComment returns unresolved doc reference for inheritdoc typeparamref #70230
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update to vs-extension-testing 0.1.184-beta #70960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Emit `readonly.` for constrained array access #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM MSAL - Usable Azure App Proxy token not available to Blazor Server when consenting to multiple resources #52495
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #52493
  • Harden nullability checks in `Endpoint.SignatureEquals` #52492
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor library component doesn't run on WASM when publishing #52491
  • Consolidate servicing docs #52489
  • Optimize QueryStringEnumerable.Decode() #52487
  • Add Content-Id as a header name #52486
  • Re-publishing .NET 8 Blazor Web App template to IIS fails: ERROR_FILE_IN_USE #52485
  • IFileInfo.PhysicalPath is empty #52484
  • Exception when navigating between Blazor pages with a [SupplyParameterFromQuery] of the same name but different type #52483
    8.0.x
  • Constant loop in scaffolded Login.razor: OnInitializedAsync when using rendermode InteractiveServer at <Routes> level #52481
  • Submit enhanced forms programatically #52479
  • Blazor Web App template: The `Layout` folder (namespace) isn't present in the `_Imports` file #52478
  • Blazor - IsSectionDefined - SectionOutlet has Content #52477
  • The .NET 8 Blazor Web App project template places appsettings JSON files in wwwroot of Client project #52476
  • Blazor Debugger does not support comma separated NO_PROXY value #52475
    Backlog
  • Update the .NET 8 Blazor Web App project template to show client-server communication over HTTP, with shared models, for Blazor WebAssembly #52474
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #52473
  • Blazor HotReload does not respect signalr filters #52472
  • HtmlContentBuilderExtensions.AppendFormat Method #52471
  • Root component type could not be found in the assembly RCL #52467

Closed

  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #51360
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor EventCallback possibility to access delegate #51987
  • .NET Core 8 Blazor Web App with interactive location is Global and interactive render mode is WebAssmebly or Auto ,Page in Server Project will appear moment then jump to not found #52276
  • Angular style routing #27328
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM: Use several languages resources in the same component #25308
    Planning: WebUI
  • Static file and routing with asterisk template conflict #52420
  • Adding partial namespaces in Blazor's razor markup #22194
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor page] Getting an exception when using a dash in page route parameters #19014
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Shared Project Template #17261
    Planning: WebUI
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger Can't Deserialze Enum #51036
  • `ApiConventionAnalyzer` does not work for `switch` expressions #42987
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, 8.0.x

Merged

  • ApiConventionAnalyzer: support switch expressions #51359
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix generating enum schema in gRPC JSON transcoding OpenAPI #52449
    area-grpc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Clean up helix retry list #52313
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow user to specify antiforgery request token source #51962
    community-contribution, feature-mvc-antiforgery, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • SignOutHttpResult/SignOutResult ctor overloads that take a single authentication scheme #51220
    area-auth, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The process cannot access the file Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #19143
    Backlog
  • Fix BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #19142
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Shell Flyout Background on Android doesn't respect theme color - makes menu and flyout items unreadable #19141
  • [MAUI 8] IsVisible false is not applied on child controls #19139
    Backlog
  • Shell button on title view is getting broken after opening modal page IOS #19138
    Backlog
  • Clipping elements in MAUI leads to a degradation in scrolling performance. #19135
    Backlog
  • iOS17 tests are not stable on CI #19134
    Backlog
  • Triggers are not working on Frame control in .net maui #19127
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] ScrollView always has a scroll bar on iOS #17224
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Publish Unpackaged Apps Error(Project Reference MAUI Library ) #9064
  • ImageButton cannot be smaller than ~30 #14932
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand is not called on iOS for IsGrouped CollectionViews #13391
  • [BUG] FontImageSource will not use Color of Parent Button #8826
  • [iOS] Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.CalendarWrite><Permissions.CalendarRead> fails to return a value on iOS 16+ #18737
  • [testing] The test ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly sometimes fails on iOS #18991
  • FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application in net 8 #19061
  • Forgot to remove PropertyChanged in TabbedPageManager of Element`s InternalChildren, which caused NRE #18457
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Converters/DataTrigger/MultiTrigger not updating the destination property #15455
    Backlog
  • iOS Crash CarouselView has MediaElement in ItemTemplate #14417
  • XAML Schemas Namespace Customization Not Supported Without 'x:Name' Declaration #19129
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor app on Mac #19126
  • Secure Storage GetAsync returns null in MAUI .NET 7 Android #18914
  • [regression/7.0.92] [Android] Grid contents and layout are messed up by Picker changes #16354
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • NET 8 Breaks iOS CSS again #18844
  • Entry.CursorPosition not working all the time #11512
    Backlog
  • background-image: url(@var) - The initial value of var cannot be empty. #17838
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. Tried to install it using "dotnet new install Microsoft.MAUI.Templates", the MAUI option showed up, but now after creation of a MAUI project, it says "Unloaded" #18927
  • MAUI DisplayAlert not modal on Android 10 #15671
  • There isn't the "Additional information" window in my VS 2022 17.8. #18928

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix concurrency problem in Android builds #19140
  • [Testing] Add swipe gestures methods to UITest #19132
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add PressVolumeUp and PressVolumeDown methods to UITest #19131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125

Merged

  • [tests] Ignore WebView leak test on old iOS #19076
    area/controls 🎮
  • Revert "[tests] Add runs on iOS17" #19133
  • iOS/Mac Catalyst 17+ Support for new Calendar Permissions #18868
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Fix flaky ShapeUpdatesBrushCorrectly test #19047
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added methods to set the device orientation from UITests #19100
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Disconnect property changes from all pages when TabbedPage set to null #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Contains to OPENJSON translation generates invalid SQL: Sintax error near '$' #32468
  • Are ReaderExecuting and ReaderExecuted on the DbCommandInterceptor always guaranteed to be called on the same thread? #32465
  • Optimize translation of comparison of two nullables without both being null #32464
  • Allow Migrations assemble to be loaded from different assemblyLoadContexts #32461
  • Translated to uncorrelated NOT IN subquery instead of correlated NOT EXISTS #32459

Closed

  • Translating getters if they work in the main query already #32466
  • Is there an option to extend the model without inheriting from DbContext? #32462
  • EF8 Breaking Change: Annotation Removed (Minor) #32424
  • EF Core 7 + Oracle database = TPT inheritance doesn't work #32206
    9.0.0
  • Invalid SQL generated for grouped query followed by `OrderBy` in SQLite and SQL Server #32347
  • Client-side parameter transformations #28028
  • Support `Sum()` for `TimeSpan.Ticks` #27103

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Make ILazyLoader not IDisposable (#32345) #32463
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Properly support LEAST/GREATEST over nullable value types #32458

Merged

  • Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32460
  • Allow ignored key values for fixup before saving using TPT #32439

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Allow opting out of new subquery translation for Contains #32434
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32456
  • Test new sqlite3mc SQLitePCLRaw bundle #32369
  • [release/8.0] Create correct JSON reader/writer for double nested value conversions #32448
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Allow empty inline collections (#32414) #32454
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview 1 MAUI baseline manifests need to be updated. #17897
  • dotnet 7.0 and dotnet 8.0 are incompatible (host part) #17894

Closed

  • Crash when dotnet build/clean #17896
  • improve download speed #12416

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #17901
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #17895
    Branch Lockdown

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #17870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17882

Updated

  • Add Mariner cross-compile VMR builds #17891
